Body:
Description: Client encountering 'low disk space' error. On 5.9.4.1
Previous tickets on same issue;
00438638
00419293
00412524 
00431160
00425756

What We've Learned Updated: 05.05
Asked the customer for approval to access the backend of the server for further investigations.

Next Steps Updated: 05.05
After receiving the approval, I'll connect to the hosted by us EPP server and clear up the disk space.

@Iosif Muntean​ , Thank you for clearing space to resolve their disk space issue. This is an issue that has they have been encountering every few months, are there any troubleshooting steps they can take to assist with a more concrete fix? It looks like another client was encountering similar issues,00430904 | Ticket | Salesforce, which they resolved by upgrading their Ubuntu appliance version.
@Evan Coane​ Yes, the newer EPP Appliances have more allocated space on the system partition (old 20GB—new 50GB).
